name: Land of Time
description:
Greetings, Admin!

As you may already know, "Land of Time" is a software created to simulate a very minimalistic world, similar to those you'd find in early 80s Atari games.

As the name implies, this world exists within time itself. In it, humans live eternally and life cannot be created and evolve.

Your task is to free humans from the dangers of the land and most importantly, save 'her' from a cycle of torment.

Weapons and armors are present in this land. Never hesitate to use them.

Here is a reminder of the controls:

SPACE BAR
Confirm / Interact
W,A,S,DMovingSHIFT while Moving
RunningARROW KEYS
ShootingCONTROLView Character Stats
ESCAPEAdmin Menu / Back

Good luck!

--------------------------------

One last thing. This software uses DirectX to work properly. If you haven't downloaded DirectX for your computer, I suggest you do so or look at the README for more details.
